title: “Refuge Area” means an area within the building for a temporary use during egress
clause_text: “Refuge Area” means an area within the building for a temporary use during egress. It generally serves as staging area which is protected from the effect of fire and smoke

source_pdf.text_snippet: “Refuge Area” means an area within the building for a temporary use during egress. It generally serves as staging area which is protected from the effect of fire and smoke
